sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react';
import { Button, Typography, Paper, Box, Input, InputLabel, Select, MenuItem, List, ListItem, Radio, FormControl, FormLabel, RadioGroup, FormControlLabel, Card, CardHeader, CardContent, CardActions } from '@mui/material';
import CloseRounded from '@mui/icons-material/CloseRounded';
import {CHARACTER_LIMIT} from '../../../constants/limits'; 
const PlantDetails = ({plantNumber, details, handleInputChange, handleFileSelection, DeleteFileFromList, handleDeletePlantFromList}) => {
    return(
        <>
            <Card sx={{ maxWidth: 345, backgroundColor: '#cfd1d0'}}>
                <CardHeader 
                    title={`Plant #${plantNumber}`}
                />
                <CardContent>
                    <Box>
                        <InputLabel>Description</InputLabel>
                        <Input name="description"
                            type="text"
                            multiline
                            maxRows={4}
                            fullWidth
                            inputProps={{ maxLength: CHARACTER_LIMIT }}
                            value={details.description}
                            onChange={handleInputChange}></Input>
                    </Box>
                    <Box>
                        <InputLabel>Price $</InputLabel>
                            <Input name="price" type="number" value={details.price} fullWidth onChange={handleInputChange}></Input>
                    </Box>
                </CardContent>
            </Card>
           
                        
                   
                        <Box>
                            <InputLabel>Image(s)</InputLabel>
                            <input
                                style={{ display: "none" }}
                                name="selectedFiles"
                                id="contained-button-file"
                                type="file"
                                multiple
                                onChange={handleFileSelection}
                            />
                            <label htmlFor="contained-button-file">
                                <Button variant="contained" component="span">
                                    Upload
                                </Button>
                            </label>
                            <Box>
                                <List>
                                    {details.selectedFiles.map(file => <ListItem key={details.selectedFiles.indexOf(file)}>
                                        <Typography variant="subtitle2">{`${file.name.slice(0, 10)}...${file.name.slice(file.name.length - 4, file.name.length)}`}</Typography>
                                        <Button
                                            value={file.name}
                                            onClick={DeleteFileFromList}
                                        >
                                            <CloseRounded />
                                        </Button>
                                    </ListItem>)}
                                </List>
                            </Box>
                        </Box> 
            <Button onClick={handleDeletePlantFromList}><CloseRounded /></Button>
                        </>
    )
}

export default PlantDetails;
